entries.source: Chat Edit: 'ok great,m now i want to introduce two more types of vol measurements. one is rolling Z-score of for (i.e vol - rolling mean)/rollingStd and the toehr is log-vol (np.log_volatility).  See the best way to add these as additional features and inplemnet'

Chat Edit: 'also review the interaction terms, I think there are some some nonleinear interactions inlcuding tte (time to expiry).  Now, tte when it comes to vol in black scholes terms should be square root of time to expiry, so perhaps we should add some square root terms in there also rather than squared or single multipler ones only'
Chat Edit: 'also add parkinson volaitlity t the type we have'
